name: Grace Dodge Dining Hall
address: Grace Dodge Hall, 525 W 120th St, New York, NY 10027, USA

reviews.text:
Traditional dining hall experience. Located in the lower level of Grace Dodge Hall at Teachers College, this location offers a set number of items in exchange for a meal swipe, or payable by Dining Dollars, Flex, or credit card.

For one meal swipe, or payable by Dining Dollars, Flex, or credit card, you get an entree bowl from the salad station or the hot line (ramen, fried rice, or curry on weekly rotation, or a burger or quesadilla), plus a hand fruit, dessert, and beverage (hot coffee or freestyle machine).
